name: Arcanists 2!
description:
Arcanists, the popular FunOrb game has been accurately re-created thanks to developer pur3 extreme. Bit of nostalgia for you...

Website: https://arcanists.online/ 

Please join via our Discord server: https://discord.gg/PNnYxsc 

(The Discord also contains a link to download the latest version of the game).

There are already new features, maps and spells over the old game with much more to come.
